lines.text: I'm the mayor of this town.

I do mayor things. 


 What kind of mayor things?

I'll have you know my duties are very important. 


 I manage things such as

blah blah blah blah blah 


 blah blah blah

They finally did it, after long last...
Very excited to finally be able to live in my dream home, thanks to Industry Corp!
Hopefully more of our taxes can go to them to help fund bigger and brighter things...
Hopefully more of our taxes can go to them to help fund bigger and brighter things...
